title: Love on the Ski Slope on Christmas Eve (TV Special)

infobox.Title:: Love on the Ski Slope on Christmas Eve
infobox.Japanese Title:: 聖夜(イヴ)は恋するゲレンデで  (Seiya (Ivu) wa Koisuru Gerende de)
infobox.Cast:: Kaito Kuroba  Kaitou Kid  Aoko Nakamori  Akako Koizumi  Keiko Momoi  Keiko's friend  Erika Konno
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Kappei Yamaguchi as Kaito Kuroba, Kaitou Kid  Ayumi Fujimura as Aoko Nakamori  Miyuki Sawashiro as Akako Koizumi  Ai Kayano as Keiko Momoi  Yuji Mitsuya as Fujie  Naomi Shindo as Erika Konno  Umeka Shoji as Keiko's friend  Megumi Han as Keiko's second friend  Sayuri Hara as Keiko's third friend  Kazumi Togashi as Keiko's fourth friend  Kenji Akabane as Kaito's friend  Shusaku Shirakawa as Kaito's second friend  Mizuki Nakamura as Kaito's third friend  Ryota Asari as Kaito's fourth friend

sections.Story: Kaito's class travel to a ski resort and hosts their own class costume couple skiing contest. Aoko partners with an unpopular classmate after being told by Akako that Kaito is her partner. Akako places a magic charm on Kaito in an attempt to make him become enamored by her, but is ineffective on Kaito who remains dejected by Aoko's pairing. Kaito is told by Aoko's partner that Aoko wants to be with him and the two agree to switch places.
sections.People: - Ekoda high school class 2-B student in love with Akako
